1.0.1: §c* Fixed critical bug where unpermitted users could access /ddmset and /ddmclear
+ Players with ddm.updates permission will be notified when an update is available
1.1.0: §cNOTE: This plugin now requires ProtocolLib! Download it here: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/protocollib.1997/
+ Hat overlay in death messages now matches player preference
+ Added option to prevent Discord from caching skins
+ Added word filter for motto messages
+ Admins can now clear other user's mottos
